basics.name: Caetano Leal
basics.label: Full-Stack developer
basics.summary: I am a full-stack developer with nearly three years of experience in the industry, where I have worked with various clients and taught classes. I have been standing out in the market.

highlights: Developed and updated company systems, adding new features.
Conducted data analysis and modeling to improve system and company efficiency.
Integrated APIs into the system to expand its functionalities.
Updated the company’s front-end using Vuetify or React frameworks and low-code solutions with WordPress for more modern interfaces.
Worked on the mobile app with Flutter to ensure accessibility and adaptability.
Created a scheduling system in PHP to optimize the workflow of the agency and its clients.
Developed chatbots for WhatsApp and Telegram using Node.js, automating customer service and increasing the agency’s efficiency.
Delivered solutions that strengthened internal operations and expanded the agency’s client reach, such as creating dashboards and advanced BI integrating technology and marketing.
Developed websites for both the company, using Nuxt and Vuetify, and the agency’s clients, using WordPress and the Adobe suite, ensuring quick and high-quality delivery.
Created a routing system for election rallies, improving campaign organization.

volunteer.organization: ETEMB State Technical School Magalhães Barata
highlights: Taught all classes of the Python and Industry 4.0 course, using mental triggers to maintain students’ focus.
Guided students in creating an IoT project using Python, cloud computing, and SQL.
Led classes and discussions on AI and information security.
Created a BI with Power BI to analyze students' IoT results, teaching the importance of data analysis.
Coordinated the team of monitors, providing guidance, ensuring effectiveness, and assisting in their development.

awards.title: Cybersecurity certificate
awards.summary: The cybersecurity course completed in the university but separately from my degree earned me this title.

awards.title: Conversion record on a website
awards.summary: 57% of the visits to our councilor's website were converted into votes.
